content:

inventory=[{"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 24, "index": 15}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 58, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 50, "index": 22}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 39, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 7, "index": 36}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 41, "index": 39}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 8, "index": 41}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a loom, I first need to craft warped_planks. To do this, I need to move the warped_stem at slot 12 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have crafted the warped_planks, I need to move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
